name: Which Floor, Please?
description:
"Which Floor, Please?"

In this game, you play the role of an elevator operator (or, in the case of a single player game, TWO elevator operators simultaneously) trying to get the residents of your apartment complex to their destinations as quickly as possible. Pick 'em up, drop 'em off, score lots of points!

Credits

All art and code by me, kristinamay!

Music credits

Trashpasser blue jazz by Stefan Kartenberg (c) copyright 2021 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/JeffSpeed68/63189 Ft: Martijn de Boer (NiGiD) (NiGiD)

SFX credits

elevator motion by Nicolas4677 - "Elevator Moving"

elevator opening and closing by Alberta96 - "Elevator" (sounds trimmed to fit game)

elevator ding by NachtmahrTV - "Elevator Bell" (ending trimmed)

Thanks to Matt for playtesting, as always. :-)
